title: Shai Belinsky Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Shai Belinsky? Check out all of Shai Belinsky's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogShai Belinsky Senior SEO Specialist Shai Belinsky Shai is a senior SEO specialist with 8+ years of experience in SEO. He began his path in the digital marketing world working as a PPC manager, but quickly discovered that SEO is the way to go. Shai holds a Bachelor’s Degree and an MBA from the College of Management Academic Studies. When he's not optimizing content and creating insanely long keyword research sheets, Shai loves watching TV shows, anime & going to the movies, listening to music, and cooking.
